name: Epub-reader
body:
#### Hello World.

This is a sample ePub reader.  I have added an CSS3 ePub.
Although the commit description says deleted ePub.. :P

It might not be a great code to reuse. But you can surely learn how an ePub is rendered. 

Thanks,
zer01
